text: Thabak pumnamak Tengban Mapuna thourangbiba amadi wareppikhiba adugi matung-inna tou-i. Aduga ahoubadagi houna mahakna lepkhraba aduda yumpham oiba, mahak masagi oiba thourang adugi matung-inna eikhoibu Christtga amata oina punsinbiduna Tengban Mapuna eikhoibu mahak masagi oiba mising oinaba khandokpire.
